categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Xanta was a Human female who served the Sith Empire in the Imperial Army during the Cold War between the Sith and the Galactic Republic. During the war, she held the rank of private and was stationed on the Sith homeworld of Korriban, where she worked as a vendor. Xanta sold weapons from a stall near the Sith Academy, some of which other soldiers tested on a target that was attached to her stall. She had tanned skin, brown hair, and brown eyes. While at her stall, she wore a gray Imperial uniform with black gloves and boots, carried a blaster pistol, and had her hair tied in a bun.
Xanta first appeared in the 2011 massively-multiplayer online roleplaying game. Star Wars: The Old Republic. In the game, she serves as a weapons vendor.
